column1: 4432,Wolverine (2003) #44,44,6246,194,"""CIVIL WAR"" Tie-in!  The smackdown of the century is here: Wolverine vs. Nitro - The Human Bomb!  But what dark secret does Nitro hold that threatens to shake up everything? And who are the three mysterious strangers tracking Wolverine?  Everything you think you know is wrong.",
